column2: CORRECTED-IBM to transfer U.S. retirees to healthcare exchanges next year (Corrects to say private. not public
column3: exchanges and clarifies cost savings is for retirees. Adds quote from IBM spokesman.)

column2: New Zealand bests Oracle in first race of America's Cup finals SAN FRANCISCO Emirates Team New Zealand beat billionaire Larry Ellison's Oracle Team USA in the first race in the final series of the 34th America's Cup sailing regatta on Saturday on San Francisco Bay.
